text: La Source () is a three-act ballet. The dances were designed by Arthur Saint- Léon. The story of the ballet was written by Saint-Léon and Charles Nuitter. The music was written by Ludwig Minkus and Léo Delibes. The ballet was first performed in Paris in 1866. A well known piece from the ballet score is the "Naïla Waltz". Source, La Source, La
title: La Source
